#Text= Hou - Ting says : " So , you 've discovered my elite army .

column1: #Text=I see their loyalty still needs some work .
#Text=" Korra says : " These airbenders should n't be used as weapons !
#Text=They have a right to choose their own paths .
#Text=" Hou - Ting says : " These airbenders are Earth Kingdom citizens , and I am their queen .
#Text=Taking them will constitute an act of war .
#Text=If you disobey me , I will bear down on you with the entire force of my kingdom !
#Text=" Korra says : " They 're leaving with me !
#Text=" Hou - Ting says : " No , they 're not !
